meanings: Verb choose, make a choice, select
choice, selection, choose, select, pick (out), opt

vlive.korean: 슈아를 선택한 이유는? Why did you choose him? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.5 부승관의 전생연분 #1 (SeungKwan Boo's Past Life Destiny #1)

vlive.english: It's not randomly given? It'll be the one for the member I chose?

vlive.english: Why did you choose the color?

examples.korean: She failed to gain admission to the university of her choice. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 자기가 선택한 대학의 입학 허가를 받지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She failed to gain admission to the university of her choice. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: First prize will be a meal for two at the restaurant of your choice. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 일등상은 직접 선택한 식당에서 2인이 식사를 하는 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: First prize will be a meal for two at the restaurant of your choice. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His linguistic ability served him well in his chosen profession. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 언어 능력은 그가 선택한 직업에서 그에게 많은 도움이 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His linguistic ability served him well in his chosen profession. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Husband and wife were similarly successful in their chosen careers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 남편과 아내가 자신이 선택한 일에서 비슷하게 성공을 거두고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Husband and wife were similarly successful in their chosen careers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: How did you decide on your major? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 전공을 선택한 이유는 무엇입니까? DARAKWON
examples.english: How did you decide on your major? Add to Wordbook
